english: His father died of a heart attack
chinese: 他的父亲死于一次心脏病

english: The accident happened on Saturday night
chinese: 这场意外发生在周六晚上

english: His family lived in an old farmhouse
chinese: 他们一家生活在一个老旧农舍里

english: Most people live in rural areas
chinese: 大部分人生活在农村地区

english: the rest students sat on the ground
chinese: 剩余学生坐在地上

english: the old man looked at the window
chinese: 这个老人看向窗户

english: A surprising revelation happened on their wedding anniversary
chinese: 一件惊讶的事情发生在他们的结婚纪念日上

english: A full moon appeared in the dark night sky
chinese: 一轮圆月出现在漆黑的夜空上

english: The students look at the complex equation
chinese: 学生们看向复杂的方程式

english: The bird rests on the sturdy branch
chinese: 小鸟们停在粗树枝上

english: A gentleman walks towards the bustling cafe
chinese: 一位绅士走向繁忙的咖啡厅

english: The thick essay lies on the shelf
chinese: 厚厚的论文摆放在书架上

english: A picture hangs at his study
chinese: 一张照片挂在他的书房

english: The fresh linens lie in the laundry basket
chinese: 干净的床单放在洗衣篮中

english: Many squirrels live in the oak tree
chinese: 许多松鼠生活在橡树上

english: The road sign points to the nearest exit
chinese: 路标指向最近的出口

english: The fragile vase stays on the top shelf
chinese: 易碎的花瓶放在顶层书架

english: The little girl walks towards the living room
chinese: 小女孩走向卧室

english: the old guests sat at the dinner table
chinese: 年老的客人们坐在晚餐桌旁

english: The great artist died from a serious illness
chinese: 这位伟大的艺术家死于一场重病

english: His glasses lie on the bedside table
chinese: 他的眼镜放在床头柜上

english: The golden treasure lies in the dense jungle
chinese: 黄金宝藏位于茂密的丛林

english: The old map points to a hidden treasure
chinese: 旧地图指向隐藏的宝藏

english: The small boat stays in the calm lake
chinese: 小船停在平静的湖面上

english: The young boy looks at the toy store window
chinese: 小男孩看向玩具店的橱窗

english: A lost puppy walks towards the city park
chinese: 一只迷路的小狗走向城市公园

english: The secret letter lies on the old wooden desk
chinese: 这封秘密信放在旧木桌上

english: The rare artifact stays in the secured vault
chinese: 这件稀有文物保存在安全保险库中

english: His parents rushed to his side
chinese: 他的父母冲到他身旁

english: The story begins in a small town
chinese: 这个故事始于一个小镇
